title: I ask for thunderbird help and get this: If you need help with Mozilla Thunderbird, you can visit the Thunderbird Support Forum or the Thunderbird Support Articles.  which brings right back here.  you are worse than windows.
content: I ask for help with thunderbird and you send me this: If you need help with Mozilla Thunderbird, you can visit the Thunderbird Support Forum or the Thunderbird Support Articles. which brings me right back here. You are worse than windows.
creator: bullishbob

title: Move Local Folders to Top
content:
In the menu of mailboxes, I want Local Folders to be first, before the individual mailboxes.

I can move it there in Account Settings - just drag it up there. When I do that, then go to the menu tab (mailboxes), it's where I want it in the mailbox menu, at the top.

But when I close the program and reopen, it's back at the bottom. How do I get it to stay at the top?

Is there an add-on that will do that?

Thunderbird 115.5.1 (64-bit) on Windows 10.

Thank you.
creator: firefox2367

title: Thunderbird hanging since update
content: Since the recent big Thunderbird update, my copy of Thunderbird has started freezing for about 30 seconds at a time frequently when I try to read a new message, get messages, or drag messages from my inbox to a folder. This was never a problem before the update to 115. I'm not sure what information would be useful to help diagnose the issue, but I'm happy to answer questions that could help. Thanks! Joel
creator: cronos1701
